caption.p: Mechanism of action of nucleoside-type drugs and prodrugs against herpesviruses. Abbreviations: ACV – acyclovir, BVDU – brivudine, IDU – idoxuridine, FCV – famciclovir, GCV – ganciclovir, PCV - penciclovir, TFT - trifluridine, VACV - valaciclovir, VDR – vidarabine, and VGCV – valganciclovir.
